dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Here is the hammer of the One Who Grips.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: The time is ripe to discipline the body. I suggest that you participate in the gathering as well to help cleanse your mind.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามกลางวัน
dataList.dlg: I did not anticipate encountering you at this hour. If you have any woes regarding your work, please don’t hesitate to inform me.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: I suggest you retire to bed early so that you may preserve your strength. As for myself… there is a matter that needs me to be gripped.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: It is one’s highest honor to aid the One Who Grips. I still have not forgotten the moment I was appointed as such.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: So you are curious about this nail. This one is used to manufacture N Corp’s canned experiences. As for its use… You would do well to see where it’s used yourself.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: This mask has been bestowed upon me by the One Who Grips. The one I wore in the past could no longer conceal the tubes carrying lifefluid.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: …It seems that there is someone recently holding the attention of the One Who Grips. It involves something about the potential to serve as a Nail. I would like to know how you determine who to appoint. Please share your wisdom.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: I am but a Hammer, serving a single Nail. Although the One Who Grips insists that I teach that disciple, a seed with the bearings of a Nail… Nay. If the One Who Grips instructs, then I am to follow.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: The hammer always waits in place, ready to be gripped.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Though I believe myself to be ever too puny to deserve such recognition, I will accept if you insist.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: I am here.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: They shan’t rest beneath the earth.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: I heed your words.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: You shall repent.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: A worthless resistance.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Such feeble faith.

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: The heretic has been purged.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: The hammer… shall pursue you to the end…

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: For the One Who Grips had ordered me to succeed.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: It was the fault of my inability.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: If the One Who Grips is satisfied, that is enough for me.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: I devote this superb victory to the One Who Grips.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: It is all… the fault of my weakness…
